section.title: The process: XML
section.programlisting: <definitions id="HelloWorld" targetNamespace="http://www.omg.org/bpmn20" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL"> <process id="helloWorld" name="Hello World"> <startEvent id="_2_1" name="Start"> <outgoing>_2_5</outgoing> </startEvent> <userTask completionQuantity="1" id="_2_4" implementation="##unspecified" isForCompensation="false" name="Say Hello" startQuantity="1"> <incoming>_2_5</incoming> <outgoing>_2_7</outgoing> </userTask> <sequenceFlow id="_2_5" name="" sourceRef="_2_1" targetRef="_2_4"> </sequenceFlow> <endEvent id="_2_6" name="End"> <incoming>_2_7</incoming> </endEvent> <sequenceFlow id="_2_7" name="" sourceRef="_2_4" targetRef="_2_6"> </sequenceFlow> </process> </definitions>
